beer.beer_description:
Awaken your senses with zesty aromas; let the fresh crispness tingle your taste buds and enjoy a smooth, lasting finish. Brewed using the finest British Hops and fresh mineral water from the Eagle Brewery Well. A rich citrus fruits taste provides a dry, refreshing beer. Bombardier is a beer for those who embrace their independent spirit and march to their own drum.

Previously known as Wells Bombardier Burning Gold.

AVAILABLE IN: CASK (4.1% ABV); BOTTLE (4.7% ABV); CAN (4.3% ABV)

items.badge_description: Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 50 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 11.

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 25 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 6!

That’s one way to get over your fear of roller coasters. Just hope you can keep it down on the loop!

That's a beer at 60 different Amusement Parks! Check-in at 5 more different ones to get to Level 13!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 210 distinct venues!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 160 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 33!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 105 distinct venues!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 145 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 30!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 160 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 33!

As the hub of the town's social scene, your local pub has what you're craving. Be sure to stop by for a pint or two! That's a beer at 5 different venues with the categories of Pub, Irish Pub or Gastropub. Visit 5 more for Level 2!

user.bio: I will find you. And I will toast you....
Life's too short for crappy beer.  Drink the good stuff.
Married to MoJoe. Traveler. Writer. You had me at day drinking.
I'd rather a full bottle in front of me than a full frontal lobotomy.....
Beer, travel and war history enthusiast.

items.badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 30 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 7!
